title: Rotiseria Mendocina
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out
description: Vegetarian take-out buffet with vegan options. Items include quiches filled with corn (humita) and spinach/pumpkin, empanadas (pastries), brown rice with vegetables, spaghetti with vegetables, variety of salads, and more.
